verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> is a רִיב֙ <WH7379> If there be a controversy בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> between men וְנִגְּשׁ֥וּ <WH5066> and they come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> unto judgment וּשְׁפָט֑וּם <WH8199> that [the judges] may judge וְהִצְדִּ֙יקוּ֙ <WH6663> them then they shall justify אֶת־ <WH853> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <WH6662> the righteous וְהִרְשִׁ֖יעוּ <WH7561> and condemn אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> the wicked

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> shall be if בִּ֥ן <WH1121> [be] worthy הַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> to be beaten הָרָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> And it shall be if the wicked man וְהִפִּיל֤וֹ <WH5307> shall cause him to lie down הַשֹּׁפֵט֙ <WH8199> that the judge וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <WH5221> and to be beaten לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before his face כְּדֵ֥י <WH1767> according רִשְׁעָת֖וֹ <WH7564> to his fault בְּמִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> by a certain number

אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> Forty יַכֶּ֖נּוּ <WH5221> stripes לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יֹסִ֑יף <WH3254> he may give him [and] not exceed פֶּן־ <WH6435> so יֹסִ֨יף <WH3254> lest [if] he should exceed לְהַכֹּת֤וֹ <WH5221> and beat עַל־ <WH5921> than אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these מַכָּ֣ה <WH4347> stripes רַבָּ֔ה <WH7227> him above these with many וְנִקְלָ֥ה <WH7034> degraded אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> then thy brother לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> your eyes ס
לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַחְסֹ֥ם <WH2629> Thou shalt not muzzle שׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> the ox בְּדִישֽׁוֹ׃ <WH1758> is threshing ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יֵשְׁב֨וּ <WH3427> dwell אַחִ֜ים <WH251> If brethren יַחְדָּ֗ו <WH3162> together וּמֵ֨ת <WH4191> of them die אַחַ֤ד <WH259> and one מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like וּבֵ֣ן <WH1121> and have no child אֵֽין־ <WH369> and has ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> the wife הַמֵּ֛ת <WH4191> of the dead הַח֖וּצָה <WH2351> shall not marry without לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man זָ֑ר <WH2114> A strange יְבָמָהּ֙ <WH2993> her husband's brother יָבֹ֣א <WH935> shall go in עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> in וּלְקָחָ֥הּ <WH3947> unto her and take ל֛וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> her to him to wife וְיִבְּמָֽהּ׃ <WH2992> and perform the duty of an husband's brother

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall be that הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> And it shall be [that] the firstborn אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom תֵּלֵ֔ד <WH3205> which she beareth יָק֕וּם <WH6965> shall succeed עַל־ <WH5921> and שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> in the name אָחִ֖יו <WH251> of his brother הַמֵּ֑ת <WH4191> [which is] dead וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִמָּחֶ֥ה <WH4229> be not put out שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> that his name מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> does not יַחְפֹּץ֙ <WH2654> like הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And if the man לָקַ֖חַת <WH3947> not to take אֶת־ <WH853> יְבִמְתּ֑וֹ <WH2994> his brother's wife וְעָלְתָה֩ <WH5927> go up יְבִמְתּ֨וֹ <WH2994> then let his brother's wife הַשַּׁ֜עְרָה <WH8179> to the gate אֶל־ <WH413> to הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> unto the elders וְאָֽמְרָה֙ <WH559> and say מֵאֵ֨ין <WH3985> refuseth יְבָמִ֜י <WH2993> My husband's brother לְהָקִ֨ים <WH6965> to raise up לְאָחִ֥יו <WH251> unto his brother שֵׁם֙ <WH8034> a name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> he will יַבְּמִֽי׃ <WH2992> not perform the duty of my husband's brother

וְקָֽרְאוּ־ <WH7121> shall call ל֥וֹ זִקְנֵי־ <WH2205> Then the elders עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> of his city וְדִבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> him and speak אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וְעָמַ֣ד <WH5975> unto him and [if] he stand וְאָמַ֔ר <WH559> [to it] and say לֹ֥א <WH3808> not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> I like לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> not to take

וְנִגְּשָׁ֨ה <WH5066> come יְבִמְתּ֣וֹ <WH2994> Then shall his brother's wife אֵלָיו֮ <WH413> to him לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> unto him in the presence הַזְּקֵנִים֒ <WH2205> of the elders וְחָלְצָ֤ה <WH2502> and loose נַעֲלוֹ֙ <WH5275> his shoe מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and רַגְל֔וֹ <WH7272> from off his foot וְיָרְקָ֖ה <WH3417> and spit בְּפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> in his face וְעָֽנְתָה֙ <WH6030> and shall answer וְאָ֣מְרָ֔ה <WH559> and say כָּ֚כָה <WH3602> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> So shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto that man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יִבְנֶ֖ה <WH1129> that will not build up אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> his brother's
וְנִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> shall be called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> And his name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> The house חֲל֥וּץ <WH2502> loosed הַנָּֽעַל׃ <WH5275> of him that hath his shoe ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִנָּצ֨וּ <WH5327> strive אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> her husband יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> A man וְאָחִ֔יו <WH251> and his countryman וְקָֽרְבָה֙ <WH7126> draweth near אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> and the wife הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of the one לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> for to deliver אֶת־ <WH853> אִישָׁ֖הּ <WH376> her husband מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand מַכֵּ֑הוּ <WH5221> of him that smiteth וְשָׁלְחָ֣ה <WH7971> him and putteth forth יָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> her hand וְהֶחֱזִ֖יקָה <WH2388> and taketh בִּמְבֻשָֽׁיו׃ <WH4016> him by the secrets
וְקַצֹּתָ֖ה <WH7112> Then thou shalt cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כַּפָּ֑הּ <WH3709> her hand לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תָח֖וֹס <WH2347> shall not pity עֵינֶֽךָ׃ <WH5869> thine eye ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have לְךָ֛ בְּכִֽיסְךָ֖ <WH3599> Thou shalt not have in thy bag אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> differing וָאָ֑בֶן <WH68> weights גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> a great וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <WH6996> and a small ס

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have לְךָ֛ בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> Thou shalt not have in thine house אֵיפָ֣ה <WH374> differing וְאֵיפָ֑ה <WH374> measures גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> a great וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <WH6996> and a small

אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> weight שְׁלֵמָ֤ה <WH8003> [But] thou shalt have a perfect וָצֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH6664> and just יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall have לָּ֔ךְ אֵיפָ֧ה <WH374> measure שְׁלֵמָ֛ה <WH8003> a perfect וָצֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> and just יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall have לָּ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> because of יַאֲרִ֣יכוּ <WH748> may be lengthened יָמֶ֔יךָ <WH3117> shalt thou have that thy days עַ֚ל <WH5921> in הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֧י <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> [are] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone עֹ֣שֵׂה <WH6213> For all that do אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> such things כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> everyone עֹ֥שֵׂה <WH6213> [and] all that do עָֽוֶל׃ <WH5766> unrighteously פ

זָכ֕וֹר <WH2142> Remember אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> did לְךָ֖ עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> what Amalek בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> unto thee by the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֥ם <WH3318> when ye were come forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> how קָֽרְךָ֜ <WH7136> How he met בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> thee by the way וַיְזַנֵּ֤ב <WH2179> and smote the hindmost בְּךָ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנֶּחֱשָׁלִ֣ים <WH2826> of thee [even] all [that were] feeble אַֽחַרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> behind וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עָיֵ֣ף <WH5889> thee when thou [wast] faint וְיָגֵ֑עַ <WH3023> and weary וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and he יָרֵ֖א <WH3373> and he feared אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> not God

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> shall come בְּהָנִ֣יחַ <WH5117> hath given thee rest יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Therefore it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ ׀ <WH430> thy God לְ֠ךָ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹ֨יְבֶ֜יךָ <WH341> from all thine enemies מִסָּבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> which the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֤ נַחֲלָה֙ <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> to possess תִּמְחֶה֙ <WH4229> it [that] thou shalt blot out אֶת־ <WH853> זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> the remembrance עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> of Amalek מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> from under heaven לֹ֖א <WH3808> must not תִּשְׁכָּֽח׃ <WH7911> thou shalt not forget פ
